text: The Weeknd and Selena Gomez attend the "Rei Kawakubo/Comme des Garcons: Art Of The In-Between" Costume Institute Gala at Metropolitan Museum of Art on May 1, 2017 in New York City. Kevin Mazur/WireImage

meta_data.title: 2017 Met Gala Red Carpet Photos: Katy Perry, Selena Gomez & More
meta_data.body: Photos from the Costume Institute's 2017 Met Gala red carpet honoring Comme des Garçons designer Rei Kawakubo, co-chaired by Katy Perry, Selena Gomez & more.   The Weeknd and Selena Gomez attend the "Rei Kawakubo/Comme des Garcons: Art Of The In-Between" Costume Institute Gala at Metropolitan Museum of Art on May 1, 2017 in New York City.
